There are personnel in the ASDF who are in charge of consistent ISR...
...in the airspace over Japan and the surrounding areas.
If any aircraft heading to Japan's territorial airspace are detected,...
They confirm the situation and monitor the aircraft activities as necessary.
Furthermore, in the event that the suspicious aircraft...
...has actually intruded in to territorial airspace,...
...ASDF issues a warning to leave the airspace.
ASDF aircrafts scramble almost 1200 times annually.
